ComicInfo.Summary:
The Calm Before The Storm: Blazer works out with the Free Force and Controller kisses her against her will, while Youthquake watches from a distance, his heart broken. Meanwhile on Georwell, Demon, Maxinor, Titan, and Talisman are taken captive by the Rebellion and are to be executed for betraying the Rebellion in an earlier adventure. The four heroes prove who they are and then join forces with the Rebellion.
Master of the Moon: As part of their plan, Challenger and Diviner surrender to Zarren. They see their boys but are soon locked away. They escape the prison when Zarren sorely underestimates Diviner. Disguised as soldiers, the two race to the command module only to discover the Invasion has begun.
ComicInfo.Title: The Calm Before The Storm; Master of the Moon
ComicInfo.Characters: Douglas Hamilton,Titan,Darkforce (flashback),Blazer,the Free Force [Controller,Pixel,Talisman,Youthquake,Maxinor,Demon,Monolith (disguised as Titan, flashback),Prosecutor Zarren (flashback),Havoc,Nightowl],Carolyn Smith
